snippet: Elke Luyten’s “Studies of Inertia” and Kendra Portier’s “Beautiful Weather for an Air Raid” give physical form to emotional currents.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews Studies in Inertia, solo dance piece by Elke Luyten, and premiere of work Beautiful Weather for an Air Raid, choreographed by Kendra Portier, at Dance New Amsterdam.
lead_paragraph: Elke Luyten’s “Studies of Inertia” and Kendra Portier’s “Beautiful Weather for an Air Raid” give physical form to emotional currents.

headline.seo: Kendra Portier and Elke Luyten at Dance New Amsterdam
headline.main: Emotional Currents Captured in Physical Forms
headline.print_headline: Emotional Currents Captured in Physical Forms
